trans-unit.source: Represents a stylus tip shaped like an ellipse.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma ponta de caneta com formato de elipse.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.EllipseStylusShape> and pass it to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.GetIncrementalStrokeHitTester%2A> method to erase a portion of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como criar um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.EllipseStylusShape> e passá-lo para o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.GetIncrementalStrokeHitTester%2A> método para apagar parte de um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> called `eraseTester` and that its <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester.StrokeHit> event has been connected to the event handler defined in this example.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> chamado `eraseTester` e que seu <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester.StrokeHit> evento foi conectado ao manipulador de eventos definido neste exemplo.

trans-unit.source: To create a control that enables a user to erase ink, see [How to: Erase Ink on a Custom Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para criar um controle que permite que um usuário apagar tinta, consulte [como: apagar tinta em um controle personalizado](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.EllipseStylusShape" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.EllipseStylusShape" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.EllipseStylusShape> and pass it to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.GetIncrementalStrokeHitTester%2A> method to erase a portion of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como criar um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.EllipseStylusShape> e passá-lo para o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.GetIncrementalStrokeHitTester%2A> método para apagar parte de um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> called `eraseTester` and that its <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester.StrokeHit> event has been connected to the event handler defined in this example.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> chamado `eraseTester` e que seu <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester.StrokeHit> evento foi conectado ao manipulador de eventos definido neste exemplo.

trans-unit.source: To create a control that enables a user to erase ink, see [How to: Erase Ink on a Custom Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para criar um controle que permite que um usuário apagar tinta, consulte [como: apagar tinta em um controle personalizado](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md).

trans-unit.source: The width of the stylus shape.
trans-unit.target: A largura da forma de caneta.

trans-unit.source: The height of the stylus shape.
trans-unit.target: A altura da forma de caneta.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.EllipseStylusShape" /> class with the specified width and height.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.EllipseStylusShape" /> com a largura e a altura especificadas.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.EllipseStylusShape> and pass it to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.GetIncrementalStrokeHitTester%2A> method to erase a portion of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como criar um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.EllipseStylusShape> e passá-lo para o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.GetIncrementalStrokeHitTester%2A> método para apagar parte de um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> called `eraseTester` and that its <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester.StrokeHit> event has been connected to the event handler defined in this example.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> chamado `eraseTester` e que seu <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester.StrokeHit> evento foi conectado ao manipulador de eventos definido neste exemplo.

trans-unit.source: To create a control that enables a user to erase ink, see [How to: Erase Ink on a Custom Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para criar um controle que permite que um usuário apagar tinta, consulte [como: apagar tinta em um controle personalizado](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md).

trans-unit.source: The width of the stylus shape.
trans-unit.target: A largura da forma de caneta.

trans-unit.source: The height of the stylus shape.
trans-unit.target: A altura da forma de caneta.

trans-unit.source: The angle of the stylus shape.
trans-unit.target: O ângulo da forma de caneta.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.EllipseStylusShape" /> class with the specified width, height, and angle.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.EllipseStylusShape" /> com a largura, a altura e o ângulo.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.EllipseStylusShape> and pass it to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.GetIncrementalStrokeHitTester%2A> method to erase a portion of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como criar um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.EllipseStylusShape> e passá-lo para o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.GetIncrementalStrokeHitTester%2A> método para apagar parte de um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> called `eraseTester` and that its <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester.StrokeHit> event has been connected to the event handler defined in this example.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> chamado `eraseTester` e que seu <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester.StrokeHit> evento foi conectado ao manipulador de eventos definido neste exemplo.

trans-unit.source: To create a control that enables a user to erase ink, see [How to: Erase Ink on a Custom Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para criar um controle que permite que um usuário apagar tinta, consulte [como: apagar tinta em um controle personalizado](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md).
